title: Oy riot, you want tons of free accounts to ban?
body:
Slap in some rioter in the GD in-game chat group and farm 'em up.

Bot scrub kids tryin' ta add me, makin' me get off my afk rear and block dem

and there's also boosters gettin' annoy af there too.

Rito pls.

yep yep
